add-character-tables.sql.preview:
-- Character Registration & Authentication Tables
-- Connects user accounts to genetic hashes and character identities

-- Character ownership table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS characters (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    character_name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    genetic_hash VARCHAR(64) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    parent_hash VARCHAR(64), -- For lineage tracking
    lineage VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, -- WARRIOR, SCHOLAR, ROGUE, MAGE
    class VAR
